original_text: Herod also did not find that he had done anything wrong. That is why he has sent him back to me. You can see this. He has not done anything bad that means he ought to die.
korean_text: 헤롯이 또한 그렇게 하여 그를 우리에게 도로 보내었도다 보라 그가 행한 일에는 죽일 일이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: that he had done anything wrong
That is why he has sent him back to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그를 나에게 돌려보낸 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He has not done anything bad
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아무 나쁜 짓도 하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: that means he ought to die
